name: Super Number Incrementer
description:
I've decided to start following this challenge by Miziziziz again, making lots of games in a short time frame, though I won't be holding myself to making every game back-to-back this time. In any case, here's another game made in a single hour. It's slightly more polished than Square Jumper, and has better music.

Key features:

  • An incrementing number (represented by a bar)
  • Basic graphics
  • Attractive, minimal design
  • Compelling, addictive gameplay
  • Buttons (with a silent S)
  • Dynamic game state that resets after winning
  • Winning
  • Purpose-composed music*
  • A sound effect
  • Available in a wide range of languages, including, and limited to: English

*Please note: this game is not the purpose for which the music was composed

Game and music by Snowy Fox
